titles.title: Stop Wasting Archive Grants Act of 2011
To amend title 44, United States Code, to repeal the National Historical Publications and Records Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary: 7/14/2011--Introduced. Stop Wasting Archive Grants Act of 2011 - Repeals provisions creating the National Historical Publications and Records Commission and its grant-making authority. Rescinds unobligated funds made available to the Commission.
